name: City of Death (itch)
description: City of Death (or Rainbows of Death 2) is an action packed first person shooter that picks up right where Rainbows of Death left off. You reality swap into the city you live in and see that it is in ruins and you attempt to figure out what is going on and find out that your reality and the Cartoon Reality are colliding and causing a reality burst that will destroy the universe.
